column4: question about scripts:  I'm getting an error when attempting to run a script (./test_rsync) but when I execute the commands individually they work fine.  Can someone take a look at this and tell me why?  http://paste.ubuntu.com/120319/
Skorasauras:  just drag an unused portion of it
Skorasauras, it won't look like anything is happening until you release the mouse.
